components.description:
A classic hourglass, all of its sand having flowed into the bottom bulb. Indicates time has passed. Color varies across platforms.

Commonly used for various content concerning time. May also be used for hourglass-shaped figures. Not to be confused with ⏳ Hourglass Not Done, whose sand is still flowing.

Used on Snapchat to indicate a Snapstreak is soon to end.
components.title: Hourglass

description:
A classic hourglass, all of its sand having flowed into the bottom bulb. Indicates time has passed. Color varies across platforms.

Commonly used for various content concerning time. May also be used for hourglass-shaped figures. Not to be confused with ⏳ Hourglass Not Done, whose sand is still flowing.

title: Hourglass

version.description:
Unicode 1.1 were pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by 17 years, and included many characters primarily sourced from the Zapf Dingbats font.

The following characters were added to Unicode in 1993 and many were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: An hourglass, generally shown without flowing sand. This hourglass emoji is used on Snapchat to indicate a Snapstreak is soon to end. Hourgl http://emojipedia.org/hourglass/
emoji_net_data.name: hourglass

bn:00110767a: Not moving quickly; taking a comparatively long time
Not happening in a short time; spread over a comparatively long time.
Spread over a comparatively long time.

bn:00069156n: A device that measures the passage of a few minutes or an hour of time thanks to sand flowing through a narrow passage from one vessel to another.
Timepiece in which the passage of time is indicated by the flow of sand from one transparent container to another through a narrow passage
A clock made of two glass vessels connected with a narrow passage, with sand flowing through that passage.
An instrument for measuring the passage of time by the passage of sand through a narrow opening.

bn:00044988n: An hourglass measures the passage of a few minutes or an hour of time.
A device that measures the passage of a few minutes or an hour of time thanks to sand flowing through a narrow passage from one vessel to another.
A sandglass that runs for sixty minutes
Instrument that measures a specific length of time

bn:00077309n: A timer is a specialized type of clock for measuring time intervals.
An internal routine that causes the system to send a message whenever a specified interval elapses.
A mechanism that measures the remaining time from a preset amount of time and sounds an alarm when this time has elapsed.
A device used to measure amounts of time.
A mechanism that measures the duration of events, like calls, Internet time, etc.
A timepiece that measures a time interval and signals its end
Type of clock used to measure amount of time since or until a set time

bn:00019887n: A clock is an instrument to indicate, keep, and co-ordinate time.
A timepiece that shows the time of day
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time.
Instrument to measure or keep track of time.
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time; a non-portable timepiece.
